column6:
An adorable retreat in an historic district of Amarillo, The Relic is conveniently close to downtown and famous 6th Street. 

Within its walls, youâ€™ll find unique antique pieces mixed with modern amenities. You will also enjoy:
*Completely remodeled bathroom
*Private fenced entry and back yard with lit patio. Dogs are welcome!
*Kitchenette with all new appliances
*Wifi and unlimited television
The Relic is a quick drive to many of Amarillo's wonderful attractions.
